author: PaulHigin
body: PowerShell currently automatically logs ScriptBlocks that are suspicious.  @LeeHolmes has done statistical analysis on known obfuscated malicious scripts and has created an algorithm that does a good job detecting these.  We should incorporate this algorithm in PowerShell so that these suspicious ScriptBlocks are also automatically logged.

comments.author: mafrahim
comments.body:
Hi @PaulHigin, where do i find the current automated Scriptblocks logging in the repo here? I have read Lee Holmes article about frequency analysis and would like to maybe implement it here.

Thanks.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT @PaulHigin Is any plans to implement this in 7.0 release?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: This is not currently in plan for 7

title: Add suspicious obfuscated scripts to PowerShell automatic ScriptBlock logging
